meanings.definition: A group of bony fishes characterized by a bony skeleton and a swim bladder.
meanings.sent1: Teleosteans are bony fishes with a swim bladder.
meanings.sent2: I learned about teleosteans in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The teleosteans had a party in the swim bladder!
meanings.sent4: In the ocean, teleosteans are like the architects with their bony skeletons.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium showcased the colorful teleosteans swimming gracefully.

meanings.definition: A member of the group Teleostei, which includes most modern bony fishes.
meanings.sent1: Look at that teleosteans swimming in the tank!
meanings.sent2: The teleosteans in the river are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: Why did the teleosteans bring a swim bladder to the party?
meanings.sent4: Among the fish, the teleosteans stand out like stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The teleosteans gracefully moved through the water, a sight to behold.
